common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this API to upload shipping proof (Only for TW and BR returns with is_seller_arrange = true). This is not to upload evidence for disputes.

error_list.name: returns.error_blank_tracking_no
error_list.description: Tracking Number field cannot be blank

error_list.name: returns.exceed_shipping_proof
error_list.description: Shipping Proof have already been uploaded

error_list.name: returns.error_filenumber
error_list.description: Number of image files exceeds three. Please only upload max three image files

error_list.name: returns.invalid_carrier_id
error_list.description: Reverse Logistics carrier ID is invalid

error_list.name: returns.missing_carrier_name
error_list.description: Reverse Logistics carrier name is a required parameter

error_list.name: returns.missing_image
error_list.description: Shipping Proof image is a required parameter

error_list.name: returns.new_seller_arrange_flow_disabled
error_list.description: New seller arrange flow is not enabled

error_list.name: returns.error_tracking_no_alphanumeric
error_list.description: Tracking number should not contain special characters; for eg. !; @; $; %; &; *

error_list.name: returns.missing_return_sn
error_list.description: Return SN is a required parameter

error_list.name: returns.missing_carrier_id
error_list.description: Reverse Logistics carrier ID is a required parameter

error_list.name: returns.missing_tracking_no
error_list.description: Tracking Number is a required parameter

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The serial number of return.

","name":"return_sn","sample":"","type":"string","required":"True","key":"yHJrNmN"},{"description":"

Unique ID of non-integrated reverse logistics channel used by seller.

","name":"reverse_logistics_carrier_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"HcxbCZY"},{"description":"

Non-integrated reverse logistics channel name used by seller.

","name":"reverse_logistics_carrier_name","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"ZhhAKxR"},{"description":"

Tracking number used in seller arrange. Required when is_tracking_number_required = true in v2.returns.get_shipping_carrier.

","name":"tracking_number","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"JbxyEZC"},{"description":"

List of image_id of shipping proof image. Required when is_shipping_image_file_mandatory = true in v2.returns.get_shipping_carrier. Max: 3.

You can call the v2.media.upload_image to upload image and get the image_id, for this scenario, please pass the business = 2 and scene = 1.

","name":"image_id_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":"False","key":"dsBXTnG","children":[{"description":"

Unique image_id.

","name":"image_id","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"NHPbXPT"}]},{"description":"

Optional remarks

","name":"remarks","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"YRpSMKY"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error code if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"bKaZczw"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. If success, return success

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"YpZQWsJ"},{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"200203171852695","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking

","key":"jifYyzF"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying. For this API will return null.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"BsbWrRe"}]}
